buff.special.bestia.reroll.info: Roll's this mobs loot table %s time(s).
buff.special.bestia.execute.info: Kills this mob if it's health is below %s%%.
buff.special.bestia.lifesteal.info: Heals player for %s%% of the damage dealt to this mob.
buff.special.bestia.reflex.info: Deals %s knockback to this mob upon being attacked.
buff.special.bestia.daze.info: Disable this mobs targeting AI for %s ticks upon attacking.
buff.special.bestia.hold.info: Disable dealing knockback to this mob.
buff.special.bestia.reroll.info.unlevele: Roll this mobs loot table more than once.
buff.special.bestia.execute.info.unlevel: Kill this mob if its health is below a certain percent.
buff.special.bestia.lifesteal.info.unlev: Heals player upon damaging this mob.
buff.special.bestia.reflex.info.unlevele: Push this mob away when it attacks you.
buff.special.bestia.daze.info.unleveled: Upon attacking this mob, disable its targeting AI temporarily.
buff.special.bestia.hold.info.unleveled: Disable dealing knockback to this mob.
